resources.string:
After Android 8.0, due to system behavior changes, please do not disable \"USB debugging\" and make sure USB usage mode unchanged, or the server will be stopped.

You will have to re-execute following steps every time you reboot your device.

Enable \"USB debugging\" in \"Developer options\" and connect your device to computer.
Type following content into computer\'s terminal and hit Enter

%s

The server running status will refresh if this operation succeed
